item.description: Hey farmfolk, nature gurus, or just people who love to be outside- NEXT FRIDAY at 1:00pm Rippling Waters in Standish needs your help transforming a quarter-acre plot into a massive mandala/radiating-clover-shape bed using hand tools, compost and mulch - its a permaculture blitz! Come join us by the river rain or shine and learn with us as we delve into this transformation of the land.  For more info email me, meetup member Stowell Watters at stowellparker@yahoo.com or check out the farm website.    Sponsored & organized by Rippling Waters.
item.why: We can help transforma farm field in a thing of permaculture beauty and productivity...

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Mandala Mob Work Party at Rippling Waters
